the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had previously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.

user_profile.user_hasnt_made_any_posts_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't made any posts yet!
user_profile.user_hasnt_started_bloggin_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't started blogging yet!

user_profile.this_is_users_reputations_score_it_is_ba:

The reputation score is based on the history of votes received by the account, and is used to hide low quality content.

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: The posting key is used for posting and voting. It should be different from the active and owner keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: The active key is used to make transfers and place orders in the internal market.
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: The owner key is the master key for the account and is required to change the other keys.
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: The memo key is used to create and read memos.

converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: Your existing %(DEBT_TOKEN)s are liquid and transferable. Instead you may wish to trade %(DEBT_TOKEN)s directly in this site under %(link)s or transfer to an external market.
converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: This is a price feed conversion. The 3.5 day delay is necessary to prevent abuse from gaming the price feed average.
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: This action will take place 3.5 days from now and can not be canceled. These %(DEBT_TOKEN)s will immediately become unavailable.

tips_js.liquid_token:
Tradeable tokens that may be transferred anywhere at anytime.
%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s can be converted to %(VESTING_TOKEN)s in a process called powering up.
tips_js.influence_token: Influence tokens which give you more control over post payouts and allow you to earn on curation rewards.
tips_js.estimated_value: The estimated value is based on an average value of %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s in US dollars.
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s is non-transferable and requires 3 months (13 payments) to convert back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: Converted %(VESTING_TOKEN)s can be sent to yourself or someone else but can not transfer again without converting back to %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s.
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of %(user_name)s's STEEM POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.

promote_post_jsx.spend_your_DEBT_TOKEN_to_advertise_this_: Spend your %(DEBT_TOKEN)s's to advertise this post in the promoted content section
promote_post_jsx.this_post_was_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: This post was hidden due to low ratings

termsagree_jsx.please_review: Please review our terms to continue
termsagree_jsx.blurb: Our Terms of Service set the rules and guidelines that you must accept and follow in order to use Steemit and our Privacy Policy explains the type of information we collect and what we do with it. Don't worry, we don't sell your data to anyone. We do use it to meet legal requirements and to learn how to make Steemit better.

modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_title: Why? You've run out of Resource Credits
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_reason: Actions such as posting and voting use computing resources, placing a real cost on the community members who run the Steem blockchain for everyone.
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_reason_2: To keep things free, Steem intelligently allocates Resource Credits to each user based on their Steem Power holdings, which can be used to submit a limited number of feeless transactions. When a user runs low on Resource Credits, they will either need to wait for them to recharge, or purchase additional Steem Power. This system prioritizes actions by good community members while limiting spam.
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_1: Buy and hold more Steem Power
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_2: Wait until your Resource Credits recharge
modals_jsx.out_of_bandwidth_option_3: Wait until the network usage decreases

tron_jsx.content0: Using TRx vote for tron node and joining in construction of TRON ECOSYSTEM, where you can receive at most eight percentage benefit rate
tron_jsx.content1: Freeze TRX before voting in order to gain right to vote.
tron_jsx.step1: Step1: click "Vote" button , which redirect to Tron scan vote page
tron_jsx.step3: Step3: Click "Sign in" button once finish input TRON private key
tron_jsx.step4: Step4: click "Vote" button and follow the instruction
tron_jsx.update_tron_content:
To update TRON account, please confirm following information so as to avoid potential risk. 
 Save TRON private key locally or import this TRON account into other wallet supporting TRON. or transfer tron asset into other tron account.
tron_jsx.update_success_content: You successfully update your TRON account. If fail to download, please
tron_jsx.update_success_content2: Please keep it safe, otherwise we cannot recover it for you.Please do not share the file with anyone else.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account: Create a TRON account and claim rewards
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content: Steemit will distribute extra TRX to you as rewards. This account is for receiving such rewards.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content1: The system will automatically create a TRON account for you for free.
tron_jsx.create_tron_account_content2: Do you agree to create a TRON account and download the PDF with your TRON public and private keys?
tron_jsx.create_tron_success_content: You have created a TRON account.
tron_jsx.create_tron_success_content3: to download the PDF with your TRON public and private keys.

tron_err_msg.data_is_invalid: Data is invalid. Please check if you are using the correct private key.
